00008 #ifndef INPUTSTREAM_H_
00009 #define INPUTSTREAM_H_
00010 
00011 
00012 #include "../Core/Object.h"
00013 #include "../Core/Primitives.h"
00014 #include "../Core/Array.h"
00015 
00016 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00017 class ByteBuffer;
00018 class String;
00019 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00020 
00021 class InputStream : public virtual Object {
00022 public:
00023     InputStream() : closed(false) {}
00024     virtual ~InputStream();
00025 
00026     virtual fsize_t available() = 0;
00027     virtual void close() { closed = true; }
00028     virtual void read() = 0;
00029     virtual bool eof() = 0;
00030     virtual bool markSupported() { return false; }
00031     virtual void mark(sidx_t) = 0;
00032     virtual sidx_t skip(sidx_t) = 0;
00033     virtual void reset() = 0;
00034 
00035     virtual InputStream& operator>>(byte&) = 0;
00036     virtual InputStream& operator>>(Array<byte>& b) {
00037         for(idx_t i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
00038             *this >> b[i];
00039         }
00040     }
00041     virtual InputStream& operator>>(ByteBuffer& buf);
00042     operator bool() { return eof() && !closed; }
00043 protected:
00044     bool closed;
00045 };
00046 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00047 
00048 #endif  /* INPUTSTREAM_H_ */
